## Model 1: The general dynamic ARDL(1,1)

Equation $(20)$:

$$
y_{t} = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1} x_{t} + \beta_{2} x_{t - 1} + \beta_{3} y_{t - 1} + u_{t}
$$

**Restrictions:** None

### Impact Multiplier

$$
\begin{split}
\theta_{1} &= \beta_{1} \\
\hat{\theta}_{1} &=  3.35220 \\
(SE &= 0.33922 )
\end{split}
$$

**Derivation:**

$$
\begin{aligned}
\theta_{1} &= \frac{\partial}{\partial x_{t}}E(y_{t}|x_{t}, y_{t-1}, x_{t-1}) 
\\
&= \frac{\partial}{\partial x_{t}}(\beta_{0} + \beta_{1} x_{t} + \beta_{2} x_{t - 1} + \beta_{3} y_{t - 1} + u_{t})
\\
&= \frac{\partial}{\partial x_{t}} (\beta_{1} x_{t})
\\
\theta_{1} &= \beta_{1}
\end{aligned}
$$

### Two-year Multplier

$$
\begin{split}
\theta_{2} &= \beta_{1} + \beta_{2} + \beta_{3} \beta_{1} \\
\hat{\theta}_{2} &= 2.89505 \\
(SE &= 0.29507)
\end{split}
$$

**Derivation:**

$$
\begin{aligned}
\theta_{2} &\equiv (\frac {\partial}{\partial x_{t}} + \frac {\partial}{\partial x_{t-1}}) E(y_{t}| x_{t}, y_{t-1}, x_{t-1}, ...) 
\\
&= \theta_{1} + \frac {\partial}{\partial x_{t-1}}E(y_{t}| x_{t}, y_{t-1}, x_{t-1},...)
\\
&= \theta_{1} +  \frac {\partial}{\partial x_{t-1}} (\beta_{0} + \beta_{1} x_{t} + \beta_{2} x_{t - 1} + \beta_{3} y_{t - 1} + u_{t})

\end{aligned}
$$
